title: Successful Data Integration from All Sources
description: Verify that the system correctly ingests and integrates clinical trial data from all nine specified data sources into the unified platform.

steps.description: Trigger data ingestion process for all nine clinical data sources.
Check that data from each source is present in the unified platform without errors.
Validate data completeness and consistency across the unified dataset.

title: Data Quality Index Calculation Accuracy
description: Validate that the Data Quality Index (DQI) is accurately calculated according to the defined 8-component weighted scoring system.

steps.description: Input clinical data samples with known quality components.
Trigger DQI calculation.
Verify DQI score matches the expected weighted calculation based on input data.
Check DQI display on Site Portal and other relevant views.

title: Patient Classification for Clinical and Operational Tiers
description: Verify the two-tier patient classification system correctly categorizes patients into Clinical and Operational tiers based on input data.

steps.description: Prepare patient data sets representing various risk profiles and cleanliness states.
Trigger classification processing.
Confirm patients are classified accurately into Clinical Tier and Operational Tier categories.
Check correct display of classification results in Unified Patient Record.

title: DB Lock Readiness Tracking Functionality
description: Verify that DB Lock Readiness tracking correctly monitors and updates study readiness milestones in real-time.

steps.description: Simulate study milestone events affecting DB Lock Readiness.
Ensure readiness status updates correctly and reflects milestone completions.
Check readiness status visibility on relevant dashboards.

title: AI Agent Diagnosis and Resolution Accuracy
description: Verify the AI Agents (Supervisor, Diagnostic, Forecaster, Resolver, Executor, Communicator) function collectively to diagnose, predict, and resolve clinical trial issues as per design using ReAct + Tool-Use orchestration.

steps.description: Provide simulated clinical trial issues as input.
Activate AI Agent workflow.
Validate diagnosis accuracy produced by Diagnostic Agent.
Verify forecaster's timeline predictions and risk assessments.
Check resolver and executor output actions and issue resolutions.
Ensure communicator agent correctly delivers status messages.

title: Digital Twin Engine Monte Carlo Simulation Validity
description: Validate Monte Carlo simulation outputs and what-if scenario analyses in the Digital Twin Engine accurately project trial timelines and resource needs.

steps.description: Input baseline trial data and define what-if parameters.
Run Monte Carlo simulations on the Digital Twin Engine.
Verify simulation outputs align with expected statistical probability distributions.
Check for accuracy of timeline projection and CRA resource optimization suggestions.

title: Collaboration via Investigation Rooms with Audit Trail Compliance
description: Verify users can collaborate in Investigation Rooms with AI agent engagement and that full audit trail logs are generated and comply with 21 CFR Part 11.

steps.description: Create an Investigation Room and invite collaborators.
Simulate issue resolution interactions involving AI agents.
Validate that all user actions and AI interactions are logged with timestamps and user metadata.
Verify audit trail integrity and access controls meet 21 CFR Part 11 compliance requirements.
Test retrieval and export of audit trail logs.

title: Clinical Report Generation and Download
description: Ensure successful generation, correct formatting, and download functionality for all 12 distinct clinical report types.

steps.description: Request generation of each of the 12 clinical report types via the Reports interface.
Verify each report generates without errors.
Check the content and formatting accuracy of generated reports.
Download each report.
Validate file integrity and usability of downloaded reports.

title: Authentication Service: Login and Token Refresh Workflow
description: Verify that the Auth Service manages user login, token refresh, and session management reliably and securely.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid user credentials and submit login request.
Verify successful login and receipt of authentication token.
Simulate token expiration.
Trigger token refresh process.
Confirm refreshed token is issued and accepted.
Log out the user.
Verify session termination and token invalidation.

title: Executive Overview Dashboard Metrics Accuracy
description: Validate that portfolio metrics and regional performance visualizations are correctly calculated and displayed in the Executive Overview Dashboard.

steps.description: Load Executive Overview dashboard with sample clinical trial portfolio data.
Verify accuracy of displayed high-level analytics and portfolio metrics.
Validate correctness of regional performance charts.

title: Site Portal DQI Management and Operational Issue Tracking
description: Verify that site teams can view and manage Data Quality Index metrics and track operational issues through the Site Portal.

steps.description: Login as site team user and navigate to Site Portal.
Check display of current Data Quality Index metrics.
Simulate entry of operational issues.
Verify operational issues are correctly tracked and updated.

title: Unified Patient Record Detail and Risk Analytics
description: Ensure detailed patient data and risk analytics are accurately presented and accessible in the Unified Patient Record feature.

steps.description: Navigate to Unified Patient Record for specific patient.
Validate presence of over 260 patient-specific features.
Check accuracy of displayed risk assessments and analytics.

title: Handling Invalid and Corrupt Data Inputs
description: Verify system behavior when encountering invalid or corrupt clinical data inputs during ingestion and processing.

steps.description: Inject invalid data formats and corrupt records into ingestion pipeline.
Confirm system detects and logs errors without crashing.
Verify invalid data is quarantined or flagged for review.
Ensure DQI calculation excludes corrupted data appropriately.

title: Session Expiry and Forced Logout Handling
description: Validate system properly handles session expiry and forces logout with appropriate user notification.

steps.description: Authenticate user and maintain active session.
Simulate session timeout or token invalidation.
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page.
Confirm user is notified about session expiration.
